Title:
A new species and a new record of Helicomyces from
Taiwan
Keywords:
Aquatic hyphomycetes, freshwater fungi, phylogenetics,
taxonomy, Tubeufiaceae
Abstract:
Helicomyces geniculatus sp. nov. from decaying wood
submerged in a freshwater stream at Juchi Town of Alishan area, Chiayi
County, Taiwan, is described and illustrated. It differs from other
Helicomyces species in having geniculate conidiophores arising from
repent hyphae and also borne on erect setae. Helicomyces torquatus is
described in this paper as a new record for Taiwan, with new
observation. The phylogenetic relationship of H. geniculatus, H.
torquatus, and related taxa were sought by comparing the sequences of
their ITS barcode of the nuc rDNA. A synopsis of the 13 accepted
Helicomyces species is given.
